Historical Newspapers Yearly N-grams and.description: -grams and Entities Dataset](https://data.bris.ac.uk/data/dataset/dobuvuu00mh51q773bo8ybkdz): Yearly time series for the usage of the 1,000,000 most frequent 1-, 2-, and 3-grams from a subset of the British Newspaper Archive corpus, along with yearly time series for the 100,000 most frequent named entities linked to Wikipedia and a list of all articles and newspapers contained in the dataset (3.1 GB)
